dojo4/being-open-with-competitors-is-val.title: being open with competitors is valuable for everyone
dojo4/being-open-with-competitors-is-val.author: corey@dojo4.com
dojo4/being-open-with-competitors-is-val.body:
There’s actually a real strategic advantage to embracing our competitors. It makes our jobs more interesting, hones the quality of our work and builds a more impactful and innovative economic landscape. Here’s a quick snippet of me talking about it for a project created by Hub Boulder about creating change:

There’s some other great “bite-sized insights from the community of social entrepreneurs, start-ups, impact investors, non-profit leaders, and other professionals haunting the halls and common spaces at HUB Boulder” on Change in 60 Seconds page of the Hub Boulder website, with friends like Praful Shah, Emily Davis, Stevan Simich, Rich Hoops and Erin Weed.
